items.sentence: I'll never forget the time we spent in Boston.
Tom's parents didn't understand what he meant.
My parents didn't allow me to go to the party.
There's a chance that Tom will be there today.
Tom was acquitted because of lack of evidence.
Be careful. You're going over the speed limit.
Tom is an athlete with extraordinary strength.
Tom is pursuing a successful career in Boston.
Tom says that he doesn't want to learn French.
Tom didn't even know I used to live in Boston.
